author: Susan Ferrechio
title: Trumps endorsement winning streak headed for tougher tests in Pennsylvania, Georgia
Morning Digest: Democratic Senate primary in Pennsylvania gets smaller as GOP's gets uglier

sentence: Trump has made various risky endorsements, including David Perdue against incumbent Brian Kemp in Georgia's gubernatorial race.
author: Alia Shoaib
title: 'Gambler' Trump is going against advisers by endorsing risky candidates like Dr. Oz and JD Vance, report says

author: Tom Boggioni
title: Trump growing gun shy about endorsements as his losses pile up: report
